named-query.name: findRelationByResource
named-query.query: select distinct m from ResourceLineAssignment m where m.child.id=:childId or m.parent.id=:parentId

named-query.name: findAllResourceLineByUseraccount
named-query.query: select distinct m from ResourceLineAssignment m, IdentityResourceAuthorization a, RoleUserAuthorization b where m.child.id=a.resource.id and a.identity.id=b.role.id and b.user.userAccount=:userAccount and a.abolishDate>:identityResourceAuthorizAtionAbolishDate and b.abolishDate>:roleUserAuthorizationAbolishDate

named-query.name: findAllResourceLine
named-query.query: select m from ResourceLineAssignment m where m.abolishDate>:abolishDate
